name: Rock Star Life Simulator: Prologue
description:
Prologue offers a more limited experience compared to the full version. In this version, you'll play as a guitarist trying to make a name for themselves on the streets.

Start playing the guitar on the street. Your decisions will shape the course of the game. You can either witness the downfall of your career or become a rock star!

If you want to be a real rock star, you must definitely play the guitar well. Master guitar playing and improve your statistics.

Try to succeed in your love life! Meet new people at the bar, learn hobbies, and try to impress them!

Becoming a world star is not an easy adventure; you need to constantly improve yourself. You also need money, so take on extra jobs or try your luck at the casino!
